summary: The file defines a suite of unit tests for Django's admin documentation views. It checks that various documentation pages—such as the index, model index, view details, template tag and filter indexes, and bookmarklet instructions—render correctly under different scenarios, including missing dependencies, namespaced URLs, absence of the sites framework, and illegal imports. The tests also verify handling of method‑based views and ensure proper setup and teardown of test data.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the admin documentation feature, ensuring developers and administrators have reliable, accurate documentation for models, views, and templates, and preventing regressions in the admin interface.
